黒鮪: (クロマグロ) - Pacific bluefin tuna (Thunnus orientalis)

黒鳶色: (くろとびいろ) - reddish brown tinged with black

黒黴: (くろかび) - black mold; black mould
黔首: (けんしゅ) - the people; the masses; the public; the great unwashed
黔黎: (けんれい) - commoners; peasantry; the masses
黙し難い: (もだしがたい) - unable to decline; hard to refuse
黙する: (もくする) - to stop talking; to be silent
黙り: (だんまり) - (黙り only) silence/without giving notice/taciturnity/refusing explanation; pantomime (in kabuki)
黙りこくる: (だまりこくる) - to keep silent
黙りこむ: (だまりこむ) - to say no more; to sink into silence
黙り込む: (だまりこむ) - to say no more; to sink into silence
黙否権: (もくひけん) - right to keep silent; right to silence; right to remain silent
黙坊: (だんまりぼう) - silent person; taciturn person
黙契: (もっけい) - implicit agreement; tacit understanding
黙念: (もくねん) - silent rumination; quiet thought
黙止: (もくし) - keeping quiet; taking no measures
黙殺: (もくさつ) - ignoring/taking no notice of/refusing even to comment on/treating with silent contempt/shelving/smothering; withholding comment
黙示録: (もくしろく) - Revelation (book of the Bible); the Apocalypse
黙秘: (もくひ) - keep silent; keep a secret
黙秘権: (もくひけん) - right to keep silent; right to silence; right to remain silent
黙視: (もくし) - view without saying a word; tacit permission
黙許: (もっきょ) - tacit permission or approval
黙認: (もくにん) - connivance; tacit consent; toleration; acquiescence
黙読: (もくどく) - (ant: 音読・1) reading silently
黝い: (あおぐろい) - black with hints of blue (as in a bruise); bluish black
點穴: (てんけつ) - pressure points (e.g. for application of moxa); vulnerable body cavities
黥く: (めさく) - (was v4k) to have a facial tattoo (esp. one around the eye, one form of punishment in ancient Japan)
黴が生える: (かびがはえる) - to get moldy/to get mouldy; to get out-of-fashion
黴びる: (カビる) - to become moldy or musty (mouldy)
黴る: (カビる) - to become moldy or musty (mouldy)
黴止め: (かびどめ) - fungicide; preservative against mold; antimold agent
黴臭: (かびしゅう) - mold smell; mould smell
黴雨: (ばいう) - rainy season; rain during the rainy season

鼈甲細工: (べっこうざいく) - article of tortoise shell; tortoiseshell work
鼈甲蜂: (べっこうばち) - spider wasp; pompilid
鼈甲飴: (べっこうあめ) - hard candy; candy suckers molded on a griddle; tortoise-shell candy
鼈茸: (スッポンタケ) - common stinkhorn (Phallus impudicus)
鼎の軽重を問う: (かなえのけいちょうをとう) - to call one's ability into question; to weigh one's ability
鼎坐: (ていざ) - three people sitting in a triangle
鼎座: (ていざ) - three people sitting in a triangle
鼎立: (ていりつ) - triangular position; three-cornered contest
鼎談会: (ていだんかい) - three-man talk; tripartite talk

鼓する: (こする) - to beat (a drum); to pluck up courage
